description: Try our easy to follow Creamy Basil Filled Cherry Tomatoes recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Cold canap√©s,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Soy free,Wheat free,Tomato,Peanut free
name: Creamy Basil Filled Cherry Tomatoes Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Slice tops from 2 x 250g punnets large cherry tomatoes. Using a teaspoon scoop out seeds and discard.

Put 125g cream cheese, fresh basil, finely grated lemon rind and lemon juice into a small food processor. Process until smooth and well combined. Season with salt and white pepper. Transfer mixture to a zip-lock bag. Snip off one corner and pipe mixture into prepared tomatoes. Garnish with a small basil leaf.
Place onto a platter and serve.
